name: Leprechaun´s Treasure
description:
Leprechaun's Treasure Plot

The old leprechaun, Torg, has lose it's treasure. A leprechaun can´t live whitout his treasure! So, Torg  entered the dangerous magical forest. Torg need to find the entrance of deeps. Guide Torg into the forest and find his treasure, but be warned, the magical forest is known to be damned. 

Development Status

This is only the first level. This game is under development. Follow to receive the updates! Have fun!
